sentences.english: Always remember that the Borzoi is a coursing Sighthound and follows its instinct to chase.
sentences.chinese: 請牢記，獵狼是視覺獵犬，他會追尋他的本能去獵捕。

sentences.english: Because of over-hunting by human beings, many animals have died out.
sentences.chinese: 由於人類的過度獵捕，許多動物都已經滅絕了。

sentences.english: Farming and urban communities, however, still hunt, although to a lesser degree.
sentences.chinese: 農區與都市社區仍然繼續在獵捕，雖然程度較低。

sentences.english: In summer they hunted a type of deer and in winter built small round houses with blocks of snow.
sentences.chinese: 夏天他們獵捕一種鹿，冬天用雪塊建造圓形小房子。

sentences.english: Indigenous peoples have lived for millennia by hunting and gathering.
sentences.chinese: 本土居民依靠獵捕和採集，在那裏生活了數千年。

sentences.english: I took pictures of the whole chase.
sentences.chinese: 我把整個獵捕的畫面都拍下來了。

definition: important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
to force someone to do something
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
to ask oneself honestly/to search in one's heart
to be unable to withstand a single blow/to collapse at the first blow
